Build 20020319

I made a new connection pointing to the dev.eclipse.org repository. It
successfully made the location, but when I tried to expand the HEAD stream, it
showed no projects. Suspecting that I may have done something wrong, I right
clicked on the location in the view and choose "discard location." I'm getting
the following NPE:
